Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Choose a variety of different sounds for the Spin Dash.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Choose the boss theme for The End.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description:
Replaces some of the tracks in the Juke Box in the series' chronological / Generations order (e.g. replacing Angel Island and Mushroom Hill with Green Hill and Chemical Plant).

The tracks from Sonic Colors is up to your personal preference :)

Elements.Name: IncludeDir4
Description:
Allows you to which Boost Filter you wish to play during Cyber Space. Choose either the vanilla boost filter or one that mimics the filters to sound like they're from Sonic Generations.

All changes are still applied no matter what option you chose.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir5
Description: Variants for Supreme's theme intro.
Improving the vanilla sounds with higher quality ones and adds little tweaks to it.
Replaces the modified Frontiers SFX with sounds from the Boost Era (Unleashed, Colors, Generations and Lost World)
Replaces the modified Frontiers SFX with sounds from the Dreamcast Era (Adventure 1, 2 and Heroes)
Merges sounds from each Preset into one!

Allows the use of other sound mods in favor for compatibility.

To make it work, just drag the associated files that modify either ''sound'' or ''general'' directories. (raw_custom1).

Allows the use of other sound mods in favor for compatibility.

To make it work, just drag the associated files that modify either ''sound'' or ''general'' directories. (raw_custom2).

Allows the use of other sound mods in favor for compatibility.

To make it work, just drag the associated files that modify either ''sound'' or ''general'' directories. (raw_custom3).
Keeps the Spin Dash sounds unchanged.
Replacing the Spin Dash charging sound with that from the Wii / PS2 version of Sonic Unleashed.
Replacing the Spin Dash charging sound with that from the Adventure series' Light Speed Shoes / Shadow the Hedgehog / Sonic '06.
Replacing the Spin Dash charging sound with that from Sonic Adventure.

Replacing ''I'm With You'' with an edited version of ''Vandalize''.

I call it ''Vandalize [Re-Edit]'' :)
Replacing ''I'm With You'' with ''One Way Dream''.
Does not modify The End's theme.
Replacing ''Reach for the Stars'' and ''Asteroid Coaster'' with their original 2010 versions and keeps the rest of tracks unchanged.
Replacing ''Planet Wisp'' with its Colo(u)rs Ultimate Remix version and keeps the rest of tracks unchanged.
Does not modify any of the Sonic Colo(u)rs soundtrack.
Replaces Sonic's awkward voice clips when he melts from the lava with those that he makes when he falls off the map.
Keeps Sonic's vanilla voice clips.

Replaces Sonic's awkward voice clips when he melts from the lava with voice clips from Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric that serve the same purpose.

Not the ideal choice but whatever, I included it for fun.

I have to admit, Roget sucks when it comes to recording voice clips for dying :/
Adds new sound effects and voice clips for Sonic in different scenarios while fighting the Titans in order to make him more interactive rather than remaining mute.

Disables Sonic's newly added dialogue. In order words, keep Sonic the silent protagonist he was.

However, it will keep the extra sound effects.
Keeps the boost filter unchanged.
Makes the Cyber Space stages' boost filters sound akin to that from Sonic Generations.
Replaces the instrumental part in the intro with the first verse of I'm Here.
Keeps the vanilla instrumental intro.
